casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Jacob CRAIN. No. 251P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 26, 2008. Jacob Grain, Pro Se. Catherine F. Jordan, Assistant Attorney General, Jerry Wilson, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 3rd day of June 2008 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th day of August 2008."
